comments:
I am seeing this error more and more over the last week.  It tends to pop up
when managing project resources (e.g. deleting projects and project files).

I have seen this error on Linux, Windows, and HP-UX.

Chris that would be your turf, can you take a look.

James where is the log trace ?
Did you not have any ?

Crhis, reset to me is this is my fault.

Log trace:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 Apr 15, 2004 15:10:38.687
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "TypeCache".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.browser.cache.TypeMatchLocator.parseMatches(TypeMatchLocator.java:503)
	at
org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.browser.cache.TypeMatchLocator.locateMatches(TypeMatchLocator.java:469)
	at
org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.browser.cache.TypeCacherJob.search(TypeCacherJob.java:196)
	at
org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.browser.cache.TypeCacherJob.run(TypeCacherJob.java:100)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:62)

Ok after a long debugging session with chris we thing we've
pin this one down, Fix in the head for the TypeInfo and the search
who suffer the same problem but the race condition was harder to
trigger.

Thanks James for the traces.

This bug has been verified on Eclipse build 20040603 and CDT build 
200406030301, and it passes.

Pixy.
